front.title: An LDAPv3 Schema for X.509 Certificates

abstract.t: This document describes an LDAP schema which can be used to implementa certificate store for X.509 certificates. Specifically, astructural object class for a X.509 certificate is defined. Keyfields of a certificate are stored in LDAP attributes so thatapplications can easily retrieve the certificates needed by usingbasic LDAP search filters. Multiple certificates for a single entitycan be stored and retrieved.
